name: Kick Of Dungeon
description:
《Kick of dungeon》 is a card game. In the game, you will explore a randomly generated dungeon, continuously expand and iterate the matching of card groups, challenge various monsters, and encounter various random events. It's full of novelty. Every time you enter the game, it's a new experience.

Key Features

70 + card skill set！

60 + encounter monsters！

Random map of each game！

Monster Preview


Skill Preview
